content.detailedDescription:
Written up on december 23, 2011

i have created google map images of my location and ufo passage that are added below.

ottawa, canada ufo ��� summer 1986

during the summer of 1986 when i was 24 years old, i was very fortunate to witness a high speed ufo travelling just above the ottawa river at what i estimate to be 3,000 to 5,000 feet.  this observation is based on aircraft normally flying at 20,000 to 30,000 feet.

the craft was a cigar shape.  tapered at both ends and thickening in the middle.

the width and thickness of the object observed from my distance was that of a canadian dime.  true length of object viewed from 1.7 miles is 30 meters to 40 meters.

please note that the human eye has a natural zoom capability for distant objects of about 1,800x.  this observation is based on my use of a modern 2011 sony video camera with a 50x optical zoom and 1,800x digital zoom.  model dcr - sr20

distance to object has been estimated at 1.7 to 2 miles using google earth, measuring from the top of the hill at the intersection at duford street and jamison avenue.

my viewing location for this event was at the top of the queenswood height's hill in orleans located approximately 10 miles from ottawa.  intersection at duford street and jamison avenue. 

in 1986 there were no houses built on this hill giving a clear view of the ottawa river and the gatineau valley 1.7 miles away.

month of sighting is june 1986.  estimate

viewing time was between 15:00hrs to 17:00hrs, broad daylight.

i had the ufo in sight for only 2 seconds.

later on i would determine with google earth that the distance covered by the ufo during my observation time was 4 miles.  this was possible because of my elevated position on queenswood heights hill giving me a clear view of the ottawa river and gatineau valley in the distance.

the ufo travelled rapidly over the ottawa river moving in an east to west direction towards the city of ottawa.

the ufo would be spotted by several students at carleton university, reported to the ottawa citizen newspaper, and written up the next day in a small story.

the event happened on a friday.  exact date unknown.

technical details of the event.

time in view 2 seconds.

distance covered 4 miles.

speed 4 miles per 2 seconds.

4 miles = 6437.376 metres

6437.376 m in 2 seconds

speed of the ufo = 3,218.688 m /s

speed of sound at sea level 340.29 m/s

speed of the ufo = 9.45866 times the speed of sound

the ufo moved through the air in absolute complete silence.

there was no sonic boom associated with this high speed travelling object and i was completely surprised.  i was listening for it intently.

this ufo therefore had the capability to move through a medium like air without displacing it.

travelling at 9.45x the speed of sound the only way not to create a sonic boom is not to displace the medium of air in the first place.

therefore ufo craft have an ability to move through a medium like air and water without displacing it.  this means that there is no friction with the medium allowing such fast velocities and changes in direction when required.

how this is accomplished is not known at this time.

could a magnetic field enable an object to move through a medium without displacing it?

a engineering challenge for future aircraft designers.

the technology to move an object through a medium without displacing it exists.

i have seen it in 1986 and that was 25 years ago.

-------------

tuesday january 17, 2012


noble peace prize committee
cc canadian prime minister stephen harper 
   (please forward to canadian defence ufo research)

re: how ufo's achieve such high velocities like 9x the speed of sound without breaking the sound barrier causing a sonic boom.  how ufo's achieve extreme manoeuvrability at high speeds.  how ufo's achieve such rapid acceleration that defy the laws of physics.

after watching the documentary below last night i came up with a hypothesis for how ufo's accomplish their tricks.  i have been thinking about this subject for the past 25 years since my own observation of a ufo travelling towards ottawa, canada at 9x the speed of sound without breaking the sound barrier.  this ufo was spotted by four other independent observers in june 1986 and written up in the ottawa citizen newspaper.

best ufo's documentary ��� i know what i saw ��� full 1:30:31 hrs - good
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=mia70txrlxc&feature=related

--------------


ufo time slip drive

last night i went to bed thinking about a comment that i had written about ufo's and their ability to defy conventional wisdom by travelling above the speed of sound without breaking the sound barrier.

ufo's are observed to travel at high velocity and change direction as if beyond capability.

when i was 24 years old, i was very fortunate to witness a ufo in june 1986 travelling above the ottawa river at about 5,000 feet towards the city of ottawa at a very high rate of speed.  later on in 2010 i would determine the speed of the ufo to be 9x the speed of sound based on the fact that it covered a 4 mile distance in 2 seconds.  event happened on a thursday or friday in the late afternoon in june 1986.

the presence of jet fighters are very rare in ottawa, but at least once every two years one would fly over queenswood heights, orleans where i lived from 10 years to 26 years of age.  from experience i knew that jet fighters generated a lot of noise when they passed overhead.

standing at the top of the queenswood heights hill, overlooking the scenic ottawa river and gatineau, quebec (intersection of duford and jamison avenue) i was intrigued by a very high velocity object that suddenly came into view travelling east to west over the ottawa river (5,000 feet estimate) headed up river towards the city of ottawa 10 miles (15.6km) away.

upon seeing the high speed object cover 4 miles in 2 seconds, i immediately began listening intently for a sonic boom and any kind of engine noise.  there was nothing, the object was completely silent and there was no sonic boom.  ���impossible,��� i thought at the time. 

���how could an object travel so rapidly through the air and not make a sonic boom���, i wondered?

the ufo was observed by four other students seconds later, who then contacted the ottawa citizen who wrote up a story the next day and printed it in the newspaper.  i was thrilled to have seen the news story to learn that other people had witnessed what i had seen.

i instantly became a ufo believer having witnessed my own event.  then my life moved on and i forgot about the incident.

throughout the next few years i would read about more ufo sightings and see video footage in 2006 shot from the us space shuttle showing a high velocity object travelling over canada and the united states at a phenomenal rate of speed.  the speed of the ufo was very similar to the one i had observed in 1986, twenty years earlier.

out of curiosity, in 2010 i would determine from google earth and google maps that the ufo i had observed in 1986 was travelling at 9x the speed of sound.  i had the ufo in sight for a distance of 4 miles due to my elevated viewing angle on queenswood heights hill.  the time for the ufo to travel this 4 miles was two seconds.  

the ufo is estimated to have been  1.76 to 2 miles away from where i stood on the queenswood heights hill to the middle of the ottawa river.  estimate determined using google earth.

the ufo was an aerodynamic cigar shape approximately 30m to 40m (1,000ft) in length.

from my perspective the ufo was the width and thickness of the edge of a dime. 

if one were to stretch out their right arm, index finger pointed out and slowly draw your arm in arc from right to left this was the velocity of the ufo over the ottawa river 1.76 to 2 miles away.  time in sight was 2 seconds.  distance covered 4 miles.  velocity 9x the speed of sound.

sonic boom ��� none.

engine noise ��� none.

disturbance of air around the object ��� none.

if you have ever seen a fighter jet travelling at or above the speed of sound near the ground you can see the shock wave around the aircraft.  the water vapour in the air condenses into droplets around the aircraft.  it is very cool to see.

so a ufo can move through a medium like air without displacing it.  

this then allows the ufo to move through air at above the speed of sound without making a sonic boom.

in my case and others ufo's are observed to travel at 9x the speed of sound and faster without creating a sonic boom.  meaning the medium of air is not displaced when the ufo travels through it.

the same effect has also been seen with ufo's travelling through the water.

ufo's can travel at a high rate of speed through a medium without displacing the medium they are in.

ufo's it then stands to reason, do not experience friction from air molecules like other aircraft.

ufo's have also been observed making impossible manoeuvres in the air like abrupt jumps to the left and right of aircraft and fore and aft of aircraft. 

ufo's have also been observed making abrupt 90 degree turns above the speed of sound.

impossible?

if ufo's do not displace the medium they travel through then why are they so streamlined?

why are ufo's cigar shape?  why not a cube?  why be so aerodynamic?

another clue.  fighter jets engaging ufo's report a loss of their control surfaces and electronic instrumentation when they get too close. 

all of the above observations make sense if one considers that we live in space-time and the ufo is warping time around it.

the ufo is streamlined because it is travelling through the medium of air.

however
 it is travelling through the air very slowly from its perspective.

the  ufo is travelling in a bubble of accelerated time.

the world outside of this time bubble is moving in slow motion.

this explains the observation of ufo's travelling at high velocities through the medium of air and water without apparently displacing it.  the time frame of the ufo relative to its surroundings is adjustable based on the time acceleration in the bubble surrounding the ufo.

this explains how a ufo can suddenly accelerate away at an unbelievable speed.

the ufo is not accelerating away.  the observers time reference is being slowed down relative to that of the ufo.

ufo's making abrupt 90 degree turns in flight can now be explained if one understands that the ufo is moving very slowly in its bubble of accelerated time.  to the outside observer from their frame of slowed time the manoeuvres seem impossible.  however from the perspective of the ufo inside the accelerated time bubble they are moving very slowly.

therefore a ufo can never create a sonic boom, because it is never close to breaking the speed of sound in its time reference.

this can best be illustrated by running a movie through a projector at a much faster speed.  the action in the film seems to be impossible based on known physical laws.  the observer is experiencing a slower time reference to that of the film. 

the ufo appears to do amazing feats of aerodynamics and acceleration because it is accelerating time in its bubble.

when jet fighters get to close to a ufo in flight they risk penetrating the accelerated time bubble surrounding the ufo.  

this is what causes a jet aircraft to loose flight control.  the jet is moving from a normal time frame of 600mph to one of 60mph or slower.  the fighter jet cannot stay in the air at the much slower speed.

moving through the  accelerated time bubble no doubt causes avionics to behave in very strange ways, which has what has been observed in numerous military cases.  specifically that of the iranian pilot in 1984.

it is impossible for modern jet fighters to catch an aerodynamic ufo, because the ufo has the ability to accelerate time in the bubble that surrounds it.  the greater the risk posed by the fighter jet, the more that time is accelerated in the ufo bubble to escape the threat.

the ufo never changes its velocity.  only the time acceleration changes, relative to the outside world.

the creation of a time accelerated bubble around the ufo may be tied to the gravitational drive that keeps it aloft in the air.

it is important to remember now that the ufo is now moving slowly in accelerated time.

this acceleration of time may also affect gravity allowing the craft to appear to be weightless.

the concept of  accelerating time in the bubble that surrounds the spacecraft can be extrapolated even further to allow these spacecraft to travel between star systems and galaxies.  the speed of light is never broken inside the space-time bubble.  however outside the ufo bubble in normal space-time the spacecraft would appear to defy physics breaking the speed of light.

the speed of light however has never been broken, only time has been accelerated in the confined bubble containing the spacecraft / ufo.  to my knowledge there is no limit to the acceleration of time.

therefore faster than light travel is theoretically possible from an outside viewers perspective.

the same phenomenon is observed when ufo's are observed to be travelling faster than the speed in normal space-time, yet there is no sonic boom (in my observation 9x the speed of sound).  this is because in the accelerated space-time bubble surrounding the ufo, the ufo is not exceeding the speed of sound, nor is it even close to it.  therefore no sonic boom is ever heard.

the same concept applies to faster than light travel from a normal space-time perspective.
ufo's can exceed the speed of light by simply accelerating time in their space-time bubble.
speeding up time is much easier and convenient to enable interstellar travel.
content.summary: Ufo observed travelling from orleans over the ottawa river towards the city of ottawa at 9.45x speed of sound (4 miles in 2 seconds). there was no engine noise, no sonic boom. the ufo also observed by 5 students at carleton university. the event was writt

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Looking north from the property i noticed 4 to 6 flashing star-like objects in the northwest.  they were moving to the east.  it was a clear, chilly moonless evening.  very light wind.  my wife, in her 40's, my son and daughter, in their 20's, and myself in my 50's, witnessed these events after i called them outside.  as they went at about 10 degrees elevation from our vantage point on the horizon, when they had reached due north, an orb about the size of an aspirin lit up in a reddish orange color.  it was located in the north east atmabout  15 degrees elevation.  it stayed lit between 2 to 4 seconds, then disappeared.  the starlike objects headed to that general area and gained a slight altitude.  they then finally went out of sight in a northeasterly direction behind the tree line.  we never heard any sound connected with these craft.

after this, there were military aircraft which could be seen and heard flying in that area and later all over the skies.  there were either 2 or 4 jets involved traveling in pairs.  my daughter left in fear to go home to her husband.  my son was amazed and loved what he was seeing.  we, my wife and i, had previously told them of these lights that we have seen two times before.  this is my first time reporting to this site and the first time our children saw the lights with us.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 to 6 starlike flashing crafts heading west to east then a reddish-orange orb illuminates and goes out.

content.summary: Orleans ufo observed travelling towards ottawa at 9x speed of sound (4 miles in 2 seconds). there was no engine noise, no sonic boom. ufo observed by 5 students at carleton university. written up in ottawa citizen.

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern:
this note is not to report a sighting, but to clarify one.
i was just checking in on a report i made in 2009 and found it on your site.
the case was given a number.... #22524

i would like to emphasize the lights i saw were not flares!
first of all, rutland is due west of west lebanon, about 60 miles away, with lots of terrain in between.
i stated in my report that i was in west lebanon looking east.
even if these lights had been flares, they were low to horizon.  even looking westerly, towards the rutland area, i would not have been able to see lights due to topography, to say nothing of the size of a flare, verses distance, and size of lights we saw.
again, the lights we saw did not waiver, have trails or drop, as flares would.
i would seriously like to speak in person to mr. steve firmani, state director of mufon,
to find out exactly how he based his conclusion.
i also want to note, that i am very disappointed in the way this research was conducted.
one would think the investigator should have interviewed, in person, to get the facts, and see location of sighting and details to make sure information is complete.

respectfully, 
jane
content.summary: Round orange/yellow lights only - blinked on and then off in straight line at slight upward angle. did not move.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a trance festival in elvas, portugal,
i became aware of the ufo in the photo after reviewing the picture on the screen.
at the end of the year when i was at a gathering of friends, one friend said he saw lights in one of the last nights of the festival, over the dance floor.
until then, he did not know about the photo i picked up in the morning of the festival.
despite the photo, i have not seen any kind of phenomenon.

i wonder what you have to say about the picture.

greats from portugal
content.summary: Ufo apears in photo

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a trance festival in elvas, portugal 2011,
i became aware of the ufo in the photo after reviewing the picture on the screen.
at the end of the year when i was at a gathering of friends, one friend said me he saw lights in one of the last nights of the festival, over the dance floor.
until then, he did not know about the photo that i picked up in the morning of the festival.
despite the photo, i have not seen any kind of phenomenon.

i wonder what you have to say about the picture.
content.summary: I was in a trance festival in elvas, portugal, i became aware of the ufo in the photo after reviewing the picture on the screen. at the end of the year when i was at a gathering of friends, one friend said he saw lights in one

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend went out for some milk and on the way home we came around a corner and up over the tree tops was a light. it morphed into two and then three. all i could do was just stare at it. gave me that feeling like when i was a little kid and i just saw something freaky. they only lasted about ten seconds. but the last thing they did was like chase each other in a circle. it was bizarre. further more, after we got home we went back outside to see if we could see it again. there must have been several planes flying crossing flight paths and a distinct sound of a jet flying low. ive been hearing this a lot in the past week or two. we decided to get on google maps and see if we could pin point where exactly we saw the lights. from where we were they were in the direction of the adirondack mountains. weird stuff, certainly changed my view on things.
content.summary: Set of glowing orbs moving randomly in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: on january 18 at 7:06 pm i stepped out of our 5th wheel when i observed a glowing red light hovering to the north at about 1,000 feet. it made no sound or emissions. i beckoned to my wife to come and watch. we both observed it for about a minute before it ascended and disappeared. i have bought a new camera and came close to getting a photo. if it keeps showing up, i will get a picture of this craft.
content.summary: Wife and i observed red light above us (again) before it ascended and disaapeared

content.detailedDescription: It was between 8:40 - 8:45 pm. i was on my apartment with my wife watching tv. we live on the sixth floor. we usually see alot of air traffic since the international airport is very close by and we're used to watch planes flying around. i was looking to the outside and i saw these three huge gold/copperish lights in the distance along with two blinking/pulsating red lights (one on top and one under the ship). i told my wife to take a look since the lights configuration didn't like the regular airplanes we use to see at night. she confirmed that it was a very different light configuration and the flight path, while being close to the regular path for other planes it was somehow different. the flight speed seemed to be very slow compared to other planes we've seen flying past by. i kept watching and the object began to turn. i was amazed of it's size. it was a little bigger than a 787. while the object was turning its cruising speed was very slow. slower than the commercial airplanes we've seen fly by. i could easily see it was triangular. the three huge lights formed the triangular shape while on top and above of the object on its center you could easily see a big red pulsating light. both red lights pulsated at the same time while the other lights fixed. i tried to follow the object for as long as i could but other buildings blocked my view. it was the biggest ship i have ever seen flying.
content.summary: Huge triangular ufo sighting in san juan puerto rico

content.detailedDescription: About 5 or 6 people were outside the wal-mart parking lot last night, i think some of them were employees on break. i was walking to my car to put my groceries in and all of a sudden i heard this big rumbling noise coming from the sky. i thought it might of been some kind of aircraft and looked up to see it (please keep in mind last night was clear! there was no cloud coverage) and i didnt see a thing! i could hear a big craft going slowly over the parking lot. it sounded like it was right over us but i didnt see anything. the people on their break were also looking up at the sky and it looked like they couldnt see what it was either - but i know they all heard it. i felt a little bit warmer when it passed right above, and somehow calmer, like i wasnt scared like i was before it did. its hard to explain it. i tried to record the sound with my cell phone but it kept turning off the whole time - no matter how many times i tried to turn it on. after it was pretty much gone all the people outside went back inside but i stayed to see if i could see what it could have been - maybe look at some lights that might come off of it and as soon as i couldnt hear it anymore i saw 2 jets racing towards whatever went over the parking lot. around the same time i heard several sirens going west as well. could this have been something flying towards ft. riley - which is in that direction? and if it was how could it have flown so slowly? it took about 3 and a half minutes for it to get just barely over manhattan - which isnt that big of a town. im still a little spooked and just want to know if anybody else heard it?
content.summary: Large unseen object going slow towards west very close to ground very loud

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the wings over houston airshow on october 16, 2011 photographing the various aircraft taking part in the aerial demonstration. i was shooting with a canon xsi dslr with a 75-300mm lens. i did not notice anything out of the ordinary while shooting that day.

on january 18, 2011 i was showing the airshow photos to a coworker when we spotted an object in a photo with a f-4 phantom. i had not seen this object previously during my brief post airshow review of the photos. im not sure if anyone else noticed the object at the airshow.

the lens was clean and no dirt was present on it. i have compared the image to other images with aircraft flying at a distance in the background and they do not match. object does not match any other the vintage or cirrent type aircraft that were present at the airshow. there were 2 p-51s in the distance while the f-4 was performing its demonstration but the object doe not seem to match them either.

i work as an aerial observer/photgrapher and also worked in aviation in the marine corps for 12 years. this does not appear to be a manmade aircraft in my opinion.

i have attached the digital photo that was taken that day of the airshow and i have also attached a photo that has aircraft in the front and distance of the photo for a comparrison.
content.summary: Wings over houston ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a friend went outside to go to the store we stopped in the driveway to comment on how clear it was and how many stars we could see.  as we were facing south east we both suddenly saw a pencil shapes bright white solid light shot across the sky from west to ,east in less than a second in a perfectly straight line. than made a sharp right angle turn than up it went as fast as it went across.  my friend livers a top a plateau that has a view of the whole valley.  we had never seen anything move that fast.  there was no sound we could hear and it seemed to be much higher than the planes in that area.  we have both seen many shooting stars, comets missiles ,fighter jets etc nothing moves as fast as this..  we are in our 40s and 50s and both saw the same thing . the whole event lasted about second or less.  i've waited my whole life to see something like this what a great night!
content.summary: Myself and a friend went outside to go to the store we stopped in the driveway to comment on how clear it was and how many stars we could see.  as we were facing south east we both suddenly saw a pencil shapes bright white solid light shot across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home seen it on my way
big red dot on sky
a ufo 
ii got my telescope out and it was there it look to me like a diamond but had a shape to it then it came down and then i felt real good like a feeling when donw my spine after i cant sleep i just know that was special
i lost it when it went down  some where?
content.summary: Red ufo over az,

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My dad and his wife were telling me about ufo's at there house for many months.I of course thought they were crazy and making it up until my fathers wife asked me if i wanted to see the ufo outside.I immediately laughed and said sure.I grabbed my lumix digital camera that has video and recorded the event.I zoomed on the bright light which appears to be like a bright star or the north star.Once i zoomed in on full, i could see the actual shape which was a perfect circle.It was greyish in color with many blurry black dots at the bottom.As i was recorded the bottom of the aircraft it zoomed much higher in the sky fast.Real fast.It zoomed up and down and i guess it realized that i was taping it and moved very high in the sky, so the only thing that would appear on my screen was a bright light.It kept going up and down but would move at light speed much faster than i could possibly zoom.Now i was completely shocked at this event.She then showed me another one that was pretty much right above the house so i zoomed in out it as well.It was the same shape,with the same black blurry dots on the bottom and it zoomed closer and then further away just like the other one and this one was just as fast....Every night these 2 ufo's are outside of my dads house and i have about 8 videos of them doing the same thing.Some with the tripod and others with me holding the camera as still as possible.I am completely freaked out right now.They are out there every damn night so i taped them every night long as the sky is clear.I never believed in ufo's before but at this moment, there is not logically explanation to what i saw and taped night after night.Right now it is 12:41 am and i am going back outside to tape another video because i am leaving in the morning to drive back to new jersey.Ufo's are very real!!!! i have many,many videos to prove this plus they come here every night!!!!

signed-believer
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several taped sightings of 2 ufo's while visiting my dad.This happened over a period of 1 week in mcdonough georgia.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw something last night i can only describe as a ufo.  i saw this in the sky twice just minutes before i took this video.  i took a video of it and posted it on youtube.  the link is posted below.  


[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Much larger than a star or a plane, bright orange star like

content.detailedDescription:
I was home at 9:30 pm, talking on the phone, when my daughter called me into her loft bedroom to show me (through her skylight) a bright light in the sky, which at first glance appeared to be a very bright star or planet. it glowed/shone red-gold-white and would dim and become bright again. it would also blink in and out randomly.

after about 15 - 30 seconds, several dimmer points of light suddenly appeared (and then quickly disappeared) directly to the left of the bright object, lighting up as if at corners of a square.

then the lights, including the original larger, brighter one, disappeared.

entire sighting lasted no more than 3 - 5 minutes. tonight is cold, very clear, lots of stars.
content.summary: Large, bright planet-like "star", red-white-gold colored, glowing; 4 other, dimmer lights briefly appeared at its left

content.detailedDescription: Me and my son were on our back deck looking at mars where we noticed lights moving really fast above and below mars in different directions. the craft must of been huge because of the brightness and how far they were. we were both shocked at what we saw. this went on for 30 minutes then the clouds came and block our view.
content.summary: Me and my son saw 3 lights moving above mars.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: In car right in front of my home. when i was driving west. i thought it was a helicopter. the ufo hovered and it's color was red. it blinked and then it disappeared really fast. when it left earth.
content.summary: Looked like a red star blinking and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home and i saw this flying in the sky. i was going to go to the balcony to see if it was still flying around but it was gone. i first noticed it by seeing the lights. i thought it was plane at first, but none of the lights were flashing and there was about 5 lights going around it in a circle. it was flying really fast and turning. i was kind of excited and scared when i saw the ufo.
content.summary: Black, with yellowish white lights. was flying in a circle fast and quietly

content.detailedDescription: I was out with my camera smoking a cigarette while trying to get shots of the weird clouds that day. above one cloud - diagonally to the right of the sun - a spot of bright light appeared. it seemed to shine brighter than an airplane and it did not move for the five minutes i observed it. my camera could not focus on it particularly well and i was also so astonished that i forgot, for the most part, to turn on auto focus. the object eventually blinked out and it started to snow.
content.summary: Object reflecting light from sun - stationary for 5 minutes - faded away

content.detailedDescription: We were driving along phenoix headed to zero street saw a large glowing object in the sky orange i stopped in the road point while we were watching the object got brighter and two more orange objects appeared got bright then disappeared.
content.summary: Looked like a star brightened up two more appear then they all disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My family was heading home from a movie heading west on hamilton rd. then myself and my wife noticed a strange light high in the sky sharply changing direction unlike any of the aircraft in the sky at the time. once witnessed i stopped the car to get a better look. the object had very brights pulsing white and red, moving quickly up and down a large distance, along with sharp movements left and right. lights were not like any aircraft i've seen, and there were aircraft in the area at the time to compare it to. 

we then proceeded down the road to get a better vantage point and observe for a while. as we moved to a better location we witnessed its sharpest movement straight down and then ascend slightly. once at a better vantage point, we witnessed the object drop closer to the horizon as well as sharply moving left and right. the object eventually dropped below the horizon and never appeared again. 

the object appeared to be a fair distance away to the west with very bright pulsing lights.
content.summary: Pulsing red and white lights with sharp changes in direction. up, down, left, right

content.detailedDescription:
About 5 weeks ago i was sitting on my front porch and noticed a bright light right above a house one block down from me.  i didn't think anything at first, then after while i noticed it moving staight up and the definitely got my attention.  i started watching it every night including tonight.  it usually appears betweem 6:00 - 6:30pm every night only it is really high up.  after it first appears, then i started seeing smaller, not so bright, i think cigar sharped crafts filling the sky.  i believe that the larger crafts are dropping them off and then later picking them up.  about 2 weekthey  ago i went out to the front yard and looked straight up and there was a second large, bright light like the first one i saw.  if i could stay up later than 11:00pm or so i would see more.  

1.  i was sitting on my front porch
2.  the brightness of the craft made me notice it
3.  maybe a tower with a light.  i really didn't pay attention until it started moving up an down.
4.  when the larger objects appears, they are coming down from really high up.  they eventually come to a complete stop for about 30 seconds then move again and come to a complete stop.  they repeat this for about an hour or 1 1/2 hours.  then they ascend an more or less hover.  sometimes jets fly very close above it or below it and it will back off for about 5 minutes and then come right back forward.  they are always in sight.
5.  at first i was totally shocked and excited.  the first thing i did was run into the house and tell my family.  they all said i was crazy and won't even talk to me about it.  i tried to find a group that would interested (on the internet).  i emailed "realufos", but never got a response back so i finally gave up.  then a fried told me to go to "mufon".  now i am kinda of used to it, but i am still bewildered.  i go out and sit on the front porch every night and watch what they are doing.
5.  i haven't lost sight of them. when i get through with this i am going outside to see what is going on.  i have been asking myself, am i the only one seeing all of this.  you are welcome to call me if you have questions.  i don't have a good camera because if i did believe me i would have taken pictures.
content.summary: Seeing crafts (more) than one for about 5 weeks

content.detailedDescription:
Four family members, including myself, were walking returning home after grocery shopping in northeast philadelphia, pa at around 6:45pm on wednesday, january 18, 2012. we first noticed the lights flying very low and close to each other back to back, almost as in a flight formation, with absolutely no sound. we could not make out a solid object around the lights that we witnessed. at first, both sets of lights appeared to be in a single horizontal line, with white lights on the sides and a large red light in the center. my son ran inside and grabbed his hd camera, and after zooming in, we realized that the large red light in the center was actually two red lights stacked one above the other. because of this, the lights looked like the following ��� : ���

again, in the video footage (to be uploaded at a later date), the lights on the sides were white and the two in the center were red; there were two of these sets of lights, making for 8 lights in total. in formation, they appeared to be diagonally flying next to each other, with one on the bottom left and one on the top right. the pair appeared to fly almost directly over us and then drifted off towards the west, over neighboring montgomery county, pa. the lights' speed was slow, possibly traveling at 10 to 20 mph. my son claims to have seen one of the sets of lights shoot up into the sky, while we saw the other one disappear beyond the tree line. i personally did not witness the first set of lights shoot up. what we witnessed was definitely not anything ordinary, especially since i am usually skeptical of ufo sightings.
content.summary: Two sets of red and white lights over philadelphia

content.detailedDescription: Walking down britainna road coming back from main street with my teenage daughter we could see a strong beam of light about 20ft wide looked to be beyond the green hill caravan site in the fields or the river beyond that it was at low tide so the river would have been very low and no boats would have been on there. could here a faint bleeping a bit like a reversing warning from a lorry but slower this and the beam of light stopped after about 2 minuets with the beam of light fading upwards. there was only light cloud cover and the sun had set but could not see anything in the sky.
content.summary: Beam of light about 20ft wide

content.detailedDescription: On january 15, 2012 1735 hours, i was the passenger of a vehicle, driven by my general manager.  i was using night vision goggles to look at mount shasta as we were driving by this mountain.  with the night vision goggles, i saw nothing spectacular.  but, as i continued to look at the sky and the mountain, all of a sudden a globe shaped ufo descended from the sky, then it quickly ascended, then descended again and ascended one more time and blinked out.  the ufo did a 'w' maneuver in the night sky.  my general manager who was driving did not see the ufo.  i would estimate that the ufo was right near mt. shasta and we were approximately 30 miles away from the mountain and ufo.
content.summary: Globe shaped ufo descends, then ascends, then descends again and finally ascends and vanishes.

content.detailedDescription: I have photos [6]and on web/e-mail, it happened around the 15 to 18 of the month when jupitor was clocet to us ??? i think jupitor?? you could not see it with the eyes the camera picked it up it was round and blue it looked like what the earth looks like from from space.    from the photos i have it was not in the same place all the time... i have no idea what it is ??? can you help me??  i can send you my e-mail photoe so that you can see for your self.. thanks paul barber    ps.. i did take the photos to the observerty but the person i talked to said it was wust a expousure ploblem with the lense.. im sory i do not think so [ ishowed him the photos / hard copy ]  not the ones on the e-mail  thanks again please let me know what you find out...    i would send the photos but i do know how. if you send me a e-mail adderee i will send you the other photos
content.summary: These pictures rere taken w/jupiter was visabile? i have e-mail pictures & pictures all i get is b.S. as answeres i hope you can help w/ this... the planet ? is blue and it looks like earth thanks.. i cac send them to you.. please let me know.

content.detailedDescription: My aunt and uncle and i were on collyer drive heading toward country oaks drive. when i noticed two red lights in the sky.  at first i thought it was the lights on top of antennae but realized there were none in that direction.  that direction being north towards shasta lake city. i then asked my aunt and uncle "what is that" and they replied "i dont know, what is it?" as we turned down country oaks drive the lights seemed to be moving with us, getting closer to each other in relation and closer to us. almost to the point were it seemed like it was an airplane gliding in for a crash landing or something. but again there were no blinking lights or any green lights on whatever it was. we finally stopped the car on mica ct. where we had a good view and to our surprise no sound at all. and they just seemed to hover there and then slowly faded/ascended to nothing. it was also slightly cloudy/overcast out. almost seemed as if they went up into the clouds. or just slowly went out.  the whole experience had all of us slightly uneasy and had the adrenaline going. as we all had a feeling it was a ufo.  neighbors up the street also had seen it and were outside there house as it was happening. and asked us if we were seeing what they were seeing.  after they disappeared we did not see anything else..
content.summary: Two bright silent orbs/lights seemed to be moving then hovered ascended/slowly faded out
